rows.label: tlk44510181_01_msg0001
rows.name:
Long ago, there used to be
a great temple beneath here.
Theospiti Temple.

rows.label: tlk44510181_01_msg0002
rows.name:
There's supposedly some kind of Blade
sealed inside now. I think it's because
they went berserk or some such.

rows.label: tlk44510181_01_msg0003
rows.name:
The legends don't say what ever
became of that Blade, though.

rows.label: tlk44510181_01_msg0004
rows.name:
And now that the temple itself has
fallen into ruin, that history is lost
to us forever...
